org.dspace.foresite

Interface Agent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OREResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgentJena

    public interface Agent
extends OREResource
    Interface representing an Agent which can be attached to any ORE resource to represent a person or other entity which has acted upon the resource. Agents can be either blank nodes or bound to a URI, depending on how they are initialised. This class extends OREResource, so inherits all the interface definitions from there also.
    Author:
    Richard Jones
    See Also:
    OREResource
